metadata.title: CVE-2021-20247 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in mbsync before v1.3.5 and v1.4.1. Validations of themailbox names returned by IMAP LIST/LSUB do not occur allowing a maliciousor compromised server to use specially crafted mailbox names containing'..' path components to access data outside the designated mailbox on theopposite end of the synchronization channel. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: isync package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
